title: Healing Nature Acupuncture & Herbal Medicine - Bike Easy
author: Allene La Spina
description: Healing Nature Acupuncture & Herbal Medicine values the power of being active and outdoor recreations. They offer acupuncture, cupping, moxabustion, and
cleaned_text: Healing Nature Acupuncture & Herbal Medicine Healing Nature Acupuncture & Herbal Medicine offers a holistic and natural approach to healthcare and well-being in New Orleans. Healing Nature Acupuncture & Herbal Medicine values the power of being active and outdoor recreations. They offer acupuncture, cupping, moxabustion, and herbal medicine to treat your body and keep you moving and healthy! Visit their website for more information: [www.healingnatureacupuncture.com](https://www.healingnatureacupuncture.com/) To schedule an appointment contact Dr. Kate Iberg kate@healingnatureacupuncture.com (504) 372-0012 3300 Daneel St, New Orleans, LA 70115 COMMUNITY - Bike parking available outside - Donates treatments as prizes for The Bike Easy Challenge - Participates in The Bike Easy Challenge EDUCATION - Bike Easy materials are made available to guests ADVOCACY - Signed on in support of New Orleans Complete Streets Coalition - Dr. Kate Iberg has appeared in a [Public Service Announcement promoting safe streets](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vLE-35O9NLg)and Bike Easy educational materials - Regularly attends City Hall and transportation outreach/insight events - Continues support of advocacy through volunteer hours contributed to Bike Easy efforts CAPACITY - $15 off of initial visit for Bike Easy Members - Regularly donates prizes to Bike Easy events UPCOMING [Join the 2023 Bicycle Second Line](https://bikeeasy.org/blog/join-the-2023-bicycle-second-line/) Mark your calendars, our Bicycle Second Line is coming back this Fall on Sunday, October 22nd! We will line up again at the Lafitte Greenway Plaza starting at 9:30 am,...
